name: ext_R5_ResearchSubject_progress
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.ResearchSubject.progress for use in FHIR R3
description: This cross-version extension represents ResearchSubject.progress from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ResearchSubject|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R3.

element.definition: The current state (status) of the subject and resons for status change where appropriate.
